title: The Gary Null Show
content:
Health Updates: exposing kids to germs makes them healthier; pomegranate- a natural HRT? <!--more--> pineapple bromelain anti-tumor effect.
Commentaries: “Aggression Begets Aggression” [John Perkins 24Mar12]; “The Real Reason Why Those on Psyche Drugs Are Committing Suicide and Homicide?” [Eileen Dannemann 23Mar12 www.preventdisease.com] Gerald Celente is one of today’s pioneers in trend strategy; founder of the Trends Research Institute, publisher of the Trends Journal [www.trendsresearch.
com] Forecasts for the next few years for national & global economies, society &  politics; now that we’ve become a facist police state- what can we do to take back our rights?

…and… Gen.
Petreaus confirmes smart chips in ‘dumb’ home appliances.
